Forms

Text inputs and textareas

Generalities

Please always use <label> tag with for attribute. And never insert field inside <label> tag

Good:
<label for="foo">Lorem ipsum </label><input id="foo" type="text" value="bar" />
Not good:
<label for="foo">Lorem ipsum <input id="foo" type="text" value="bar" /></label>
